trill.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: to make a short repeated high sound
trill.translation[0].definitions[1].defi: to say something in a high happy voice that sounds slightly false
trill.translation[0].definitions[1].exam: ‘Have a nice time, darling, ’ she trilled.
trill.translation[1].definitions[0].defi: a musical sound made by quickly moving between two notes
